title: The yvngxchris Interview: Coming Up Out of Virginia, Touring with Lil Tecca, Lil B Fandom & More
description:
Yvngxchris talks about his upbringing, focusing on music, inspiration, Lil Tecca, Lil B, Ice Spice and more!

---
00:00 Intro
3:57 - Growing up, hating school, growing up listening to Andre 3000 and Lil Wayne, his parents supporting anything he wanted to do 
5:16 - Seeing Lil Wayne’s “A Milli” video and being convinced he wanted to rap
6:34 - Finishing Highschool school at 17 so he could keep pursuing music 
10:10 - Turning on Chief Keef to hook up with a girl to, drill music 
11:18 - Posting his first song to Tik Tok getting 5k likes, screaming at 3am recording in his parents house 
14:50 - His first show, meeting the team he has now 
16:24 - Going on Tour with Lil Tecca, being yourself when performing, the power of tik tok 
19:38 - Reacting to Ice Spice video of crowd not feeling her, trolls faking “boos” on peoples concert footage 
21:47 - Signing to Alamo records, not wanting to be a industry plant 
24:06 - Signing to Columbia Records, getting a manager who made his vision come to life, not knowing about Young Chris who was signed to Rocafella records 
27:05 - Working with Lil Yatchy, shooting the “Damn homie” video with him, wanting Erykah Badu colab 
29:42 - Being a big Lil B fan, using sample from his Joe Biden song, Lil B saying it was fire 
32:33 - Dropping his “Virality” mixtape, people being carried out his show from the mosh pits

---

Yvngxchris talks about his upbringing, focusing on music, inspiration, Lil Tecca, Lil B, Ice Spice and more!


---

00:00 Intro

3:57 - Growing up, hating school, growing up listening to Andre 3000 and Lil Wayne, his parents supporting anything he wanted to do 

5:16 - Seeing Lil Wayne’s “A Milli” video and being convinced he wanted to rap

6:34 - Finishing Highschool school at 17 so he could keep pursuing music 

10:10 - Turning on Chief Keef to hook up with a girl to, drill music 

11:18 - Posting his first song to Tik Tok getting 5k likes, screaming at 3am recording in his parents house 

14:50 - His first show, meeting the team he has now 

16:24 - Going on Tour with Lil Tecca, being yourself when performing, the power of tik tok 

19:38 - Reacting to Ice Spice video of crowd not feeling her, trolls faking “boos” on peoples concert footage 

21:47 - Signing to Alamo records, not wanting to be a industry plant 

24:06 - Signing to Columbia Records, getting a manager who made his vision come to life, not knowing about Young Chris who was signed to Rocafella records 

27:05 - Working with Lil Yatchy, shooting the “Damn homie” video with him, wanting Erykah Badu colab 

29:42 - Being a big Lil B fan, using sample from his Joe Biden song, Lil B saying it was fire 

32:33 - Dropping his “Virality” mixtape, people being carried out his show from the mosh pits
